restarter.partial_crash_warn: På grund af et delvist crash, vil serveren genstarte om et minut. Vær venlig og disconnect nu.
restarter.partial_crash_warn_discord: På grund af et delvist crash genstarter, **%{servername}** om et minut.
restarter.schedule_warn: Serveren genstarter om %{smart_count} minut. Vær venlig at disconnecte nu. |||| Serveren genstarter om %{smart_count} minutter.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** genstarter om %{smart_count} minut. |||| **%{servername}** genstarter om %{smart_count} minutter.

ban_messages.kick_temporary: (%{author}) You have been banned from this server for "%{reason}". Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
ban_messages.kick_permanent: (%{author}) You have been permanently banned from this server for "%{reason}".
ban_messages.reject_temporary:
You have been banned from this server.
Your ban will expire in: %{expiration}.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.
ban_messages.reject_permanent:
You have been permanently banned from this server.
Ban ID: %{id}.
Ban Reason: %{reason}.
Banned by: %{author}.

nui_warning.title: ADVARSEL
nui_warning.instruction: Hold [SPACE] nede i 10 sekunder for at afvise denne meddelelse.
